channel.title: oop on Jakob Richter
channel.description: Recent content in oop on Jakob Richter

item.title: mlr3 and mlr3verse
item.description: Co-author of the successor of mlr. I contributed to the early development and new object-oriented design of mlr3. The mlr3verse consist of various R packages that are developed in a big team across universities. I largely commit on doing code-reviews and helping others to contribute to the project. My main contributions are to the packages related to tuning mlr3tuning, bbotk and mlr3mbo.
